(b) Explain the following types of maintenance in computing: (i) corrective; (ii) adaptive; (iii) preventive.
correct_answer:

(b) Types of Maintenance
(i) Corrective maintenance:is a task performed to identify, isolate, and rectify a fault so that the failed equipment or system can be restored to an operational condition. OR Any maintenance performed to return equipment or system to a proper working condition.(ii) Adaptive maintenance:is the modification of an existing system to meet/suit new/changing environment/technological development.(iii) Preventive maintenance:is a form of maintenance that is regularly performed on a system to avoid breakdown or failure. OR it is a maintenance performed while the equipment is still working so that it does not break down unexpectedly.
